comment._content: Mabelle Gilman Corey (1882-1966?), actress, second wife of William Ellis Corey (the president of US Steel). They divorced in 1923. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mabelle_Gilman_Corey

comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca for the information. We'll add some of it to the record the next time that we update.
